hadiths.text: Narrated Hudhaifah:When the Apostle of Allaah (sal Allaahu alayhi wa sallam) got up during the night (to pray), he cleansed his mouth with the tooth-stick

chapter.ara-name: باب السِّوَاكِ لِمَنْ قَامَ مِنَ اللَّيْلِ
chapter.eng-name: Using The Siwak When Praying The (Voluntary) Night Prayer
